title: Test Model Selection - Sonnet API
description: Test task to verify Sonnet model selection works via API
details: This is a simple test task to verify that the model sonnet parameter flows through the entire system correctly via API.
test_strategy: Check that Claude is executed with default sonnet model

markdown_files.content:
# Test Model Selection - Opus

Test task to verify Opus model selection works end-to-end

# Model Selection Test Design

## Purpose
Test that Claude model selection (--model opus) flows through the entire system.

## Expected Behavior
1. API accepts model: "opus" parameter
2. TaskRun CRD has model field set to "opus"
3. Claude container starts with --model=opus argument
